      • runForAndroid

        public static ConstraintReporter runForAndroid(String apkFilePath,
                                               String androidJarPath,
                                               String sourceCodePath,
                                               boolean standalone,
                                               Set<soot.jimple.infoflow.android.callbacks.CallbackDefinition> callbacks,
                                               Config configuration)
                                        throws IOException,
                                               org.xmlpull.v1.XmlPullParserException
        Run COVA for analyzing Android apks.
        Parameters:
        apkFilePath - the apk file path
        androidJarPath - the android jar path
        sourceCodePath - the source code path
        standalone - true, if use COVA as a standalone tool
        callbacks - the callbacks found in apk
        configuration - the configuration
        Returns:
        the reporter
        Throws:
        IOException - Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.
        org.xmlpull.v1.XmlPullParserException - the xml pull parser exception

                                            String appClassPath,

                                            Config config,
                                            String mainClass)
        Run COVA for analyzing java application.
        Parameters:
        appName - the app name
        appClassPath - the app class path
        sourceCodePath - the source code path
        libPath - the lib path
        config - the config
        Returns:
        the reporter
